abs.action: Braking works without ABS; drive carefully; service soon.

airbag.action: Service soon; airbags may not deploy correctly.

awd_fault.action: Drive carefully; avoid off-road; service soon.

battery.action: Minimize electrical load; service soon; if multiple lights appear, prepare to stop safely.

blind_spot.action: Check mirrors and blind spot before changing lanes.

brake_warning.meaning: Brake system issue or parking brake engaged.
brake_warning.action: Check parking brake; if released, stop safely and inspect brake system.

check_engine.action: Check for obvious issues; drive moderately; scan OBD-II soon.

coolant_temp.action: Stop safely; let engine cool; check coolant level and leaks.

cruise_control.action: Normal operation; press brake to cancel.

open_door.meaning: Door or trunk not properly closed.
open_door.action: Check all doors and trunk; close securely.

dpf.action: Drive at highway speeds for 15-20 minutes; service if light persists.

esp.meaning: Electronic Stability Program active or fault.
esp.action: If flashing, system is working; if steady, service soon.

glow_plug.action: Wait for light to turn off before starting engine.

high_beam.action: Switch to low beams when approaching other vehicles.

lane_departure.action: Stay within lane markings or use turn signals.

oil_pressure.action: Stop immediately; check oil level; do not continue if light stays on.

steering.action: Steering may be heavy; service soon; drive carefully.

security.action: If flashing, system is armed; if steady, check key or service.

service_required.action: Schedule service appointment; check owner's manual.

tire.action: Check all tire pressures; inflate to recommended PSI.

traction_control.action: If constantly on, service soon; drive gently.

transmission_temp.action: Stop safely; let transmission cool; check fluid level.
